Example usage

With Postcode:

https://sheltered-dawn-83931.herokuapp.com/search/SW1A%202AA

With Address

https://sheltered-dawn-83931.herokuapp.com/search/10%20downing%20street%20london

Example output

{ status: "OK", search: "10 downing street london", location: { addressNumber: "10", addressStreet: "Downing Street", city: "London", postcode: "SW1A 2AA", lat: 51.5033635, lng: -0.1276248, serviceArea: [ "LONCENTRAL" ] } }

Unknown Address:

https://sheltered-dawn-83931.herokuapp.com/search/abcdef123456

Example output

{ status: "NOT_FOUND", search: "abcdef123456" }
